content: *update* a video tutorial is also now available here 1 about the pattern the pattern contains steps-by-steps instructions to crochet a snowmen garland with bright colourful scarves the pattern also contains pictures to help you along the way materials 3mm hook 1 65mm hook white yarn and various colours for the scarves i used light 3 acrylic yarn orange crochet thread size 10 stuffing material scissors needle stitch marker finished size approx 7cm tall pattern use you may sell finished items made from this pattern but please include credits to baubles and yarn please share your creations with me so i can see and share them you can find me at instagram com/baubles_and_yarn 1 https //baublesandyarn com/index php/2025/01/08/snowman-crochet-garland-free-pattern/
